title: AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed非正常退出
author: anwenchao
txt_content:
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x0000000073e82b48, pid=10764, tid=13420
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_51-b16) (build 1.8.0_51-b16)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.51-b03 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# V  [jvm.dll+0x42b48]
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# A:\QQ文件\开端整合包\.minecraft\hs_err_pid10764.log
#
# Compiler replay data is saved as:
# A:\QQ文件\开端整合包\.minecraft\replay_pid10764.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
这个非正常退出是为什么,一开始还不是特别频繁，现在越来越多了,java换了几次了,而且特别是游戏角色死后很多这个错误。

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
先尝试更新你的Java
卸载旧的 安装这个 https://c-t.work/s/7deb17bb0de842

replies.author: anwenchao
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-10 13:52
先尝试更新你的Java
卸载旧的 安装这个 https://c-t.work/s/7deb17bb0de842
我更新了几次了,我再试试
你需要 考虑到是否是模组的问题 再考虑是否是java的问题
